children.label: # 100 instructions: verify the interleaving of green/red colors according to the descriptions. # ----- # 200 instructions: also verify that the submenu entry looks as described. # ----- # 300 instructions: then visit the submenu and verify interleaved background colors. # ----- # 999 expect no more output (except usage stats or sh -x) on stdout and stderr. # -----
Submenu (green on pink Monospace bold x-large small-caps underlined & overlined)...
ENTER THIS MENU Submenu red bg white fg, size 20...

submenus do not inherit multi-section formatting from the level above.
